title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox Tells His Wife is Moving to Vegas + Artist We Wish We Could Have Seen in the Past! + Movie Mike Reviews Bullet Train
itunes:title: (Tues Full) Lunchbox Tells His Wife is Moving to Vegas + Artist We Wish We Could Have Seen in the Past! + Movie Mike Reviews Bullet Train
description:
We get more details on Lunchbox’s Vegas audition and he even tries out a portion of what would be included in his role. He went home and told his wife they were moving to Vegas…Amy brings us the question “What artist or act do you wish you could have seen in the past?” so we each give our picks for who and when we’d want to see them.  Bobby asks Mike D what he thought about the new Brad Pitt movie “Bullet Train” and gets into a discussion of movie theaters vs. watching movies at home.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
